//The Exit to Prontera

new_1-2,99,68,4	script	Exit	903,{
	warp "prontera" ,156,188;

close;
end;
}
//The Exit to Prontera

prontera,165,191,4	script	Enter-Mall	903,{
	warp "new_1-2" ,99,109;

close;
end;
}
